permissions: Allowed for users who can access the related organization invoices batch via policy scope; scope delegates to OrganizationInvoicesBatch and permits admins, broker members, and manager-level members of other organization types (e.g., customer/trucker) tied to the batch.
validation_notes: Filters expecting Type|ID format: --invoice and --organization. --organization-id requires --organization-type unless a Type|ID value is provided. --successful expects a strict boolean (true/false) and maps to successful/failed scopes.

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Filter by organization (format: Type|ID, e.g., Broker|123)

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.description: Filter by organization ID (requires --organization-type or Type|ID)
flags.validation: Requires --organization-type unless a Type|ID value is provided.

flags.name: --organization-invoices-batch
flags.description: Filter by organization invoices batch ID

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.description: Filter by organization type (e.g., Broker, Customer, Trucker)

flags.name: --successful
flags.validation: Strict boolean expected: true or false.
